description.value: Can cause loud screech, unprotected creatures in 30 metre radius that can hear must make Willpower Test or lose a half action on their next turn.

system.benefit: Can cause loud screech, unprotected creatures in 30 metre radius that can hear must make Willpower Test or lose a half action on their next turn.
